html:
‘Tis the season for gifts and more gifts, and Amazon is in the gift-giving mood. The company is providing Prime members with 18 free video games this December.

Suggested Reading

The Week In Games: A Star Wars Classic Returns & More New Releases

  • Off
  • English

Suggested Reading

Each month, Amazon Prime members can grab a few free PC games via the retailer’s Prime Gaming rewards. But this month, Amazon is handing out gifts like Santa Claus after one too many White Russians. And best of all, there are actually some really good games in Prime’s long list of freebies. (That’s not always the case with these monthly free games.)

If you hop over to Amazon Prime Gaming and are currently subscribed to Amazon Prime, you can snag Star Wars: Bounty Hunter, Dredge, Overcooked 2 and the underrated Old West shooter Call of Juarez: Gunslinger. It’s also nice to see Bounty Hunter on here, as the remaster is a solid way to play the old third-person Star Wars adventure.

And throughout the month, Amazon is adding more games to its list of freebies, including Quake 2, Predator Hunting Grounds, and Planet of Lana.

The full list of games and when they are being added to Amazon Prime Gaming is below. Keep in mind that these are PC games and many of them require Steam, GOG, or Epic to claim, so make sure you are logged in and ready to collect all your December goodies before they disappear on January 5.

Available Now

  • Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
  • Dredge
  • Tomb Raider: Underworld
  • Overcooked 2
  • Call of Juarez: Gunslinger

December 5

  • Quake 2
  • Disney’s Pixar: Wall-E

December 12

  • Planet of Lana
  • Hero’s Hour
  • The Coma: Recut
  • Electrician Simulator
  • ReDrawn: The Painted Tower

December 19

  • Predator: Hunting Grounds
  • Simulakros
  • Nine Witches: Family Disruption
  • Aces of the Luftwaffe: Squadron
  • Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake 

December 26

  • The Town of Light
